attributes.action: remove Steve McClaren from the position of England Football Manager and promote Gavin Dutton to the aforementioned position
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gavin Dutton is currently coach of Felpham Colts Under 11's and is doing a great job. He is showing the passion that has been sadly lacking in recent months by the so called cream of English football

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
